mr.robotto.components.comp

Class MrComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • mr.robotto.components.comp.MrComponent
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MrMesh, MrShaderProgram, MrTexture

    public abstract class MrComponent
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class for an element with a Model-Renderer-Controller architecture. The model class allows access to data layer The renderer class allows access to rendering function And the controller manages access to model and renderer layers from outside

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      protected static class  MrComponent.Data
      Base class for data layer
      protected static class  MrComponent.View
      Base class for rendering layer
